name: Waifu Bombshell
description:
A basic Tower Defence game built over a couple weekends with a dear friend back in the summer of 2017.

The story is that magical anime waifus have to defend the realm against the evil orcs coming to rule the world. The levels go from grassy plains to forests, deserts, frozen tundras, with the final level taking place in hell.

There are 8 unique types of towers, with some being main attack towers and other being support types.

It was a fun little project to work on, I hope you enjoy it!
